title: How many books are there in Allen study material (JEE)? - Quora

response.answer_text: HCV is a must. In IOC you can solve(and memorize) the book by Shri Vishal Joshi(senior IOC faculty at Allen),published by Cengage.For OC,you can solve(and memorize) the book by Akshay Choudhary,published by Pearson(senior OC faculty at Allen).There are no special books for Maths and Physical Chemistry. You can consolidate your concepts to a very high degree even without solving these books if you honestly solve Allen's study material and get your doubts cleared regularly. Except the first one,the other two are not mandatory in all batches . If you have still some time left,you can solve Irodov.Remember,quality is more important than quantity .

I didn't know the counting of books bcoz i never count them but the books is alot but that doesn't mean that we can't read them bcoz the books are thin and interesting so if we try then we work hard and move on with allen study material
